post.title: URL format
post.content: * Link to the post at the blog page: `...html#foo-bar-post` * Link to the post separate page: `...html?foo-bar-post` * Link to the posts with specified tag: `...html?*foo` * Link to the posts with specified tags: `...html?*foo,bar` * Link to the post page in different context (see below): `...html?de:foo-bar-post` * Link to the posts with tags in different context (see below): `...html?de:*foo,bar`
